jhelp.util.gui

Class JHelpFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.gui.JHelpFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstantsGUI

    public final class JHelpFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConstantsGUI
    Represents a font with underline information
    Author:
    JHelp
